Look, this bot is quite specific and has a tendency to move the plot of the RP in a certain direction. She has a skill that allows her to completely hide information about her double life, like Mistress C. How she will react if YOU ignore this premise I have not tested.

Essentially, any interactions with her should be similar to the interactions between Batman and Catwoman, and gpt and claude plays this out pretty well. But YOU don't have to play it. Greetings has hints, but does not oblige you to stick to the scenario. However, I tried to frame this opportunity for you, because at its core, Carmilla Rider is a combination of clich√©s about seductive thieves who get away with everything because of their sexuality.
